wikipedia_page.main: Lucy Annie Middleton (née Cox; 9 May 1894 – 20 November 1983) was a Labour politician in the United Kingdom.

response: *Labour: Lucy MiddletonReport of the Annual Conference of the Labour Party, 1939

In 1968, she served as Acting General Secretary, following the resignation of Len Williams, and until Harry Nicholas was appointed.Lucy Middleton, Women in the Labour Movement: The British Experience, pp. 157, 203.
